The prefix "re" means to do again. In life, it is a priviledge when we are allowed to redo things. JESUS, by His spirit, renews us. He makes us new again.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Zephaniah 3:17
-   Week 2
    -   Lamentations 3: 22-23
-   Week 3
    -   2 Corinthians 4:16
-   Week 4
    -   Colossians 3: 9-10
